title: Drone Farming Test
description: Program the alpha drone to plant and harvest wheat crops

phases.title: Programming the Drone
phases.description: Learn how to program the alpha drone

preDialogues.name: Lain
preDialogues.content: Now that you know about the alpha drone, let's see if you can get it working!

preDialogues.name: Lain
preDialogues.content: Click on the drone to open its programming interface. It works just like yours - you can write Python code to control it.

preDialogues.name: Lain
preDialogues.content: The drone knows all the same functions you do: move_up(), move_down(), move_left(), move_right(), plant(), and harvest().

phases.title: Test the Drone
phases.description: Have the drone plant and harvest 5 wheat crops

preDialogues.name: Lain
preDialogues.content: Here's your first task: Program the drone to plant wheat on 5 farmland tiles, wait for them to grow, then harvest them.

preDialogues.name: Lain
preDialogues.content: Remember, the drone needs to move to farmland, call plant('wheat'), wait for the crops to grow, then call harvest().

preDialogues.name: Lain
preDialogues.content: You'll need to use loops to make this efficient. The drone should complete all 5 plant-and-harvest cycles on its own!

objectives.description: Program the drone to plant and harvest 5 wheat crops
Program the drone to plant and harvest 5 wheat crops

postDialogues.name: Lain
postDialogues.content: Excellent work! The drone completed the entire farming cycle successfully!

postDialogues.name: Lain
postDialogues.content: Grandpa would be proud. This old drone still has plenty of life left in it after all!
